cast.overview: A psychologist is sent to a space station orbiting a planet called Solaris to investigate the death of a doctor and the mental problems of cosmonauts on the station. He soon discovers that the water on the planet is a type of brain which brings out repressed memories and obsessions.
cast.title: Solaris

details.biography: Georgiy Teykh was born on June 13, 1906 in St. Petersburg, Russian Empire as Georgi Nikolayevich Tejkh. He was an actor, known for Solaris (1972), Rasputin (1981) and Voyage to the Planet of Prehistoric Women (1968). He died on January 29, 1992 in St. Petersburg, Russia.
details.name: Georgiy Teykh
